doc:
Charles Carson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Carson_(actor) 0 Charles Carson (16 August 1885 – 5 August 1977) was a British actor. A civil engineer before taking to the stage in 1919, his theatre work included directed plays for ENSA during WWII. Charles_Carson ( 16_August_1885 – 5_August_1977 ) was a_British_actor . A_civil_engineer before taking to the_stage in 1919 , his_theatre_work included_directed plays for ENSA during WWII .
